alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 11:20PM CDT until April 13 at 4:36PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Minnesota... Big Sioux River below Dell Rapids affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Luverne affecting Rock County. Big Sioux River near Trent affecting Moody County. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Big Sioux River above Hawarden affecting Sioux, Union and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Brookings and Moody Counties. Big Sioux River at Akron affecting Plymouth and Union Counties. Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River at Rock Rapids. * WHEN...Until Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, the lower banks on the left side of the river will begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and then to a crest of 14.3 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Rock River Rock Rapid 13.0 12.4 Sun 10 pm 13.8 13.9 12.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
